en.title: Educational Background
en.description: Explore my academic journey, shaped by curiosity, dedication, and a deep passion for languages and research.

zh.title: 教育 背景
zh.description: 探索我由好奇心、投入與語言熱情所構築的學術旅程。

en.title: Taipei Municipal Chien Kuo High School
en.description: Developed a strong academic foundation at one of Taiwan’s most prestigious high schools. As an active member of the Information Club, I cultivated an early interest in computer science and programming—skills that would later complement my linguistic research.

zh.title: 建國中學
zh.description: 就學期間奠定學術基礎。活躍於資訊社，從中萌生對電腦科學與程式設計的興趣，這些技能後來成為語言學研究的重要助力。

en.title: National ChengChi University
en.description: Pursued a major in Arabic, with a double major in Japanese and a minor in Korean. Throughout my undergraduate years, I fully embraced academic challenges and made extensive use of the university’s resources to deepen my expertise in linguistics and language studies. I also actively engaged in fieldwork and research, including corpus collection and phonetic analysis. Outside the classroom, I maintained a healthy balance by participating in athletic competitions and team sports.

zh.title: 政治大學
zh.description: 主修阿拉伯文，雙修日文，輔修韓文。大學四年間積極面對學術挑戰，善用校內資源深入語言與語言學研究，亦實地參與語料蒐集與語音分析等田野工作。課餘時間也不忘均衡生活，持續參與各類運動賽事與團體活動。

en.title: National Taiwan University
en.description: Currently pursuing a master's degree in Linguistics, with a research focus on computational linguistics, phonetics, and neurolinguistics. My current work integrates AI technologies with linguistic theory, aiming to develop systems that reflect cognitive logic in language structure. I aspire to contribute to the future of language research through interdisciplinary innovation.

zh.title: 台灣大學
zh.description: 攻讀語言學碩士，專注於計算語言學、語音學與腦神經語言學的交叉研究。目前致力於將AI技術與語言理論融合，建構更符合人類認知邏輯的知識系統，期望在語言研究的未來發展中貢獻創新力量。
